Title: Object: Napoleon Bonaparte on his Celebrated White Charger
Description: Bonaparte, in finely embroidered military uniform and riding boots, a mameluke sword at his side; mounted on his horse, Marengo; beyond the desert landscape of Egypt and military tents; after C. Vernet; illustration to Ireland's "Life of Napoleon" (1823-28) Etching
Bibliographic references: Reid 1871 / A descriptive catalogue of the works of George Cruikshank (1185)
Associated names: Representation of: Napoléon I, Emperor of the French (Napoleon)
Associated titles: Life of Napoleon Buonaparte, Late Emperor of the French, King of Italy, Protector of the Confederation of the Rhine, Mediator of the Confederation of Switzerland etc., etc., his Astonishing Career, etc., with Biographical Memoirs of Contemporary Characters
